pokemon.name: Pokemon Card Game
pokemon.description: Pokemon card game, created at the beginning of Ironhack Training. To play you have to pick 5 cards, then start the game and play with keyboard arrows. The website is not responsive, it is better to have a look at it on a PC or MAC. I created this game because I like Pokemon and I found it funny to do a card game. It is a front end application

trip.name: Trip & Karmeliet
trip.description: Full MERN Application. It was my final Project at Ironhack. The idea was to create a travel platform managing tool, where you can decide what you will do during the holidays, when, and at which price. The name is inspired from the famous beer Triple Karmeliet. I created this application based on an idea I wanted to develop after working at TourScanner 2 years ago. I thought it could have been a great tool to add to their website in the future. The application is not responsive. To use the application you need to create an account. The password will be encrypted

ekam.name: EKAM GAMES
ekam.description: Back-end Application created with two other people at Ironhack (Vincent Proum & Maximilan Gruber). The idea was to create a video game platform where you can add into a list the video game you have, the one you finished and the one you wish to have. We wanted to create a copy of Mangacollec for videogames. The application is not really responsive. To use the applicaiton you need to create an account. The password will be encrypted.
